Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim

Class VmAllocationPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.VmAllocationPolicy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppModuleAllocationPolicy, NetworkVmAllocationPolicy, PowerVmAllocationPolicyAbstract, VmAllocationPolicyCombinedMostFullFirst, VmAllocationPolicyCombinedMostFullFirst, VmAllocationPolicyOverbooking, VmAllocationPolicySimple
    public abstract class VmAllocationPolicy
extends java.lang.Object
    VmAllocationPolicy is an abstract class that represents the provisioning policy of hosts to virtual machines in a Datacentre. It supports two-stage commit of reservation of hosts: first, we reserve the host and, once commited by the user, it is effectivelly allocated to he/she
    Since:
    CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
    Author:
    Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov

      • allocateHostForVm

        public abstract boolean allocateHostForVm​(Vm vm)
        Allocates a host for a given VM. The host to be allocated is the one that was already reserved.
        Parameters:
        vm - virtual machine which the host is reserved to
        Returns:
        $true if the host could be allocated; $false otherwise
